summary.Title: Rigger/Scaffolder for Offshore Project
summary.Presentation: Are you an experienced Rigger or Scaffolder looking to take on a rewarding new opportunity? Semco Maritime is looking for dedicated and skilled candidates to join our team in the Danish sector of t

JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
Are you an experienced Rigger or Scaffolder looking to take on a rewarding new opportunity? Semco Maritime is looking for dedicated and skilled candidates to join our team in the Danish sector of the North Sea. This project is set to commence in March 2025 and will run until July 2025.

 
About the role

As a Rigger/Scaffolder, you will play a key role in ensuring the safe and efficient execution of offshore operations. Your expertise will contribute to the success of a project that embodies innovation, sustainability, and collaboration.

 
Responsibilities
  • Perform rigging and scaffolding tasks in compliance with safety standards and project requirements.
  • Collaborate with the offshore team to ensure timely and efficient project delivery.
  • Maintain equipment and ensure all operations are conducted with the highest level of safety and professionalism.
 
Qualifications
  • Offshore experience is mandatory.
  • Relevant certifications in rigging and scaffolding.
  • Strong understanding of offshore safety protocols and procedures.
  • Team-oriented mindset with excellent communication skills.
 
Welcome to Semco Maritime

We are reviewing applications on an ongoing basis, so we encourage you to submit your application as soon as possible.

If you have any questions or would like more information, please contact Anna Dam at anna@semcomaritime.com.

We look forward to welcoming you to the Semco Maritime team!
